ValidationRule.description: OPSSYS-1030 Confirms that this account is related to at least one Premium: order management opportunity with status after signed/onboarding OR Premium: Marketplace opportunity with status closed succeeded
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator') && NOT($Permission.Override_Validation) && ISCHANGED(Account_Status__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c,'Partnership Execution') || ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c,'Active & Revenue Generating')) && Nr_of_Premium_Order_Management_Opp__c < 1
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Make sure we have a relevant opportunity on a stage where we actively negotiate.
